itemDescription: Officer of the British Army during the French Revolutionary and Napoleonic Wars, and the Peninsular War and War of 1812

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Arthur Brooke KCB (1772 – 26 July 1843) was an Irish officer of the British Army during the French Revolutionary and Napoleonic Wars, and the Peninsular War and War of 1812. He rose to the rank of lieutenant-general.
